review_data.title: Excellent wines, food and atmosphere
review_data.content: This place offers excellent wines from all over the world for very good prices (starting at CHF 6.50). They have around 50 wines - it's a lot of fun to try some different ones with friends or the partner. The food combinations are amazing. We...More

review_data.title: Lovely Place with good wine selection

review_data.title: Really nice place and very good option for a good night with your couple and wine😊

review_data.title: Excellent Japanese/Peruvian kitchen

review_data.title: Great new find

review_data.title: Amazing experience
review_data.content: Went last Friday with my friends, we had a wine from Australia that was CHF 6,5.- per glass and was a good ratio between price and quality. We also had dinner, we strongly recommend the Rindsfilet, see picture.

review_data.title: Nice place if you want great wines with a great dinner
